mapper.select: SELECT UCASE(A.SUGGESTION_TYPE) AS suggestionType, B.BOOK_ID AS bookId, B.TITLE, B.AUTHOR, B.TRANSLATOR, B.PUBLISHER, B.PUBLISH_DATE AS publishDate, B.IMAGE_URL AS imageUrl, B.DESCRIPTION, B.CATEGORY_ID AS categoryId, B.categoryName FROM BOOK_SUGGESTION A, ( SELECT X.*, Y.CATEGORY_NAME AS categoryName FROM BOOK_LIST X, BOOK_CATEGORY Y WHERE X.CATEGORY_ID = Y.CATEGORY_ID ) B WHERE A.BOOK_ID = B.BOOK_ID AND UCASE(A.SUGGESTION_TYPE) = #{suggestionType}
